content: Is the google calendar still updated? I see a message above mentioning an event on Feb 3, but I don't see anything on the calendar other than a few slots marked "busy". I'd like to begin attending these, I just need to know when they are :)

bstrie said:

Is the google calendar still updated? I see a message above mentioning an event on Feb 3, but I don't see anything on the calendar other than a few slots marked "busy". I'd like to begin attending these, I just need to know when they are :)

https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/305296-rustc-reading-club/topic/Jan.206th.20session/near/269596654

and

https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/305296-rustc-reading-club/topic/Next.20steps.20for.20RRC/near/269597490

I think those will answer your question. If not, let me know.
I see, is there a waiting list I can join to know when slots open up? :)

bstrie said:

I see, is there a waiting list I can join to know when slots open up? :)

We don't currently have a waiting list. But we are looking at ways to open the sessions up a bit. The first most likely to be the recording that we will share on YouTube. Watch this stream. I'm hoping there will be additional reading clubs that are launched in the not too distant future.
